question: Who has been appointed the new CEO of MyGov India?
explanation: Abhishek Singh, the 1995-batch IAS officer of Nagaland cadre, has been appointed the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of MyGov India, the government\'s citizen-centric online platform. He succeeded tech entrepreneur Arvind Gupta. Â The aim of MyGov India is to empower people to connect with the government and contribute towards good governance.
